About: Hello, I'm Itay Levy, a passionate software and game developer. I love creating innovative software solutions and engaging game experiences.

ProjectCards.name: Project 1
ProjectCards.description: Innovative 3D store, including both VR and Web experiences, offering customers new ways to engage with their telecom provider including features like: Universal Wagon asset - innovative 3D asset which can be integrated into any Metaverse or 3D Environment, GenAI Customer Service Agent - GenAI powered AI that you can talk and interact with in VR, and more...

ProjectCards.name: Project 1
ProjectCards.description: As part of my service, I took part in the development of 3D Military simulations aimed for testing and evaluating new military technologies and weapons, including Infantry and Infantry-based systems, UAVs, Vehicles, etc.
